channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLhealthAndWellness, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Key brain protein may hold answers for memory loss and neurodegenerative diseases
item.description: Scientists have discovered how a key protein helps maintain strong connections between brain cells that are crucial for learning and memory.
